org.glassfish.hk2.utilities.reflection

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.hk2.utilities.reflection.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends Object
    A logger for HK2. Currently implemented over the JDK logger
    Author:
    jwells
